name: pipegate-sdk
description: A TypeScript client-side payment authentication SDK for stablecoins used with axios

scripts.cjs:build: tsc -p tsconfig.cjs.json && find dist/cjs -name '*.js' -exec sh -c 'sed -i "" "s/\.js/\.cjs/g" "$1" && mv "$1" "${1%.js}.cjs"' _ {} \; && mkdir -p dist/cjs/wasm && cp -r src/wasm/cjs/* dist/cjs/wasm && find dist/cjs/wasm -name '*.js' -exec sh -c 'sed -i "" "s/\.js/\.cjs/g" "$1" && mv "$1" "${1%.js}.cjs"' _ {} \;
scripts.esm:build: tsc -p tsconfig.json && mkdir -p dist/esm/wasm && cp src/wasm/pipegate.js src/wasm/pipegate.d.ts src/wasm/pipegate_bg.wasm.d.ts dist/esm/wasm/
scripts.build: rm -rf dist && npm run cjs:build && npm run esm:build && npm run copy:wasm && npm run verify:wasm

author: Dhruv Agarwal <dhruvagarwal2003@gmail.com>
